metadata.name: Powershell XML Execute Command
metadata.comment: Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution. PowerShell is a powerful interactive command-line interface and scripting environment included in the Windows operating system. (Citation: TechNet PowerShell) Adversaries can use PowerShell to perform a number of actions, including discovery of information and execution of code

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.xml.xmldocument')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.load')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('iex ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-expression ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-command ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('icm -'))))
